do you mean the GRUB menu by "bootloader"?
can't you use the up/down keys to change to the OS/Kernel you want?

just checking... by "click" I am gonna assume you mean "hitting enter key"
click means enter key
OK, and do your other OS's still work? if so, what OS's are they?
try choosing the ubuntu-minimal option, then wait a minute or so, then hit the ctrl-alt-F1 key combo
that will change it to a terminal and tell us if the issue is with X or the graphics card or if you truly have a non-booting system
